Params: {3: "The girl's memories flash before your eyes—quick, but crystal clear."}
{1: '1', 3: 'As your mind settles, you see Luna sitting before you, her eyes bright.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I never expected you to go this far. Even knowing your friendly nature, I didn't think you'd offer such thorough assistance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'After all, an agent with an overly safe M.I.N.D. would be no good to Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'An unstable M.I.N.D. will only make you more unpredictable.', 3: '25'}
{2: "Besides, you're the one who said to trust me.", 3: '26'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's precisely because I trust you that I've come to this conclusion.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'The Gray Raven Commandant may be willing to risk death, but 【kuroname】 would never presume to make decisions for the squad or the people of the Clean Zone.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Luna stands, her brow furrowing.'}
{3: 'She can sense it—something new has emerged, not just in this room... no, not just on this island, but within her entire M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Is this... your contingency plan? Some kind of mental "shackle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Acting within the M.I.N.D. is always easier than in the physical world.', 3: '35'}
{3: 'Surprisingly, Luna shows no anger. Nor does she propose any countermeasures that would lead to a cycle of mutual restrictions.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "No... I'm just feeling a bit pleased.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna places her finger under your chin, her fingertip sliding down as if toying with an invisible shackle.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This means my understanding of you is accurate, without flaw.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's fingertips trace your neck, hovering over your vital point."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "My trust isn't misplaced. Your willingness to do this for those you care about proves that when we fight side by side, you'll show me the same consideration.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "That's good. Many face me with weapons drawn, few with their back turned.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If I\'m right, without further commands, this "shackle" will gradually dissolve to nourish the island, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna walks away, her posture relaxed as she heads toward the seemingly calm M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'Luna turns around, a faint smile playing on her lips.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If we ever work together again, it'll be my turn to put a shackle on you, I promise.", 4: '1'}
